game.name: Cochonnet
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play Pétanque online with your friends, the traditional french ball-throwing sport where 2 teams compete to land their metal balls closest to the target.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play Pétanque online with your friends, the traditional french ball-throwing sport where 2 teams compete to land their metal balls closest to the target.
